code.displayName: Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:a 20 yo M presents with mild delusional thoughts and frantic speech for about 3 weeks. o:Height 70 in, Weight 187 lbs, Temperature 98.3 F, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 15 a:Paranoia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed paliperidone - 6 mg daily (in a.m.), and ordered Mental Status exam.

s:21 YO m student c/o 4 weeks h/o mild upset that coworkers deliberately try to be irritating because they are jealous and mild delusional thoughts and frantic speech. o:Height 69 in, Weight 182 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Paranoia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed paliperidone - 6 mg daily (in a.m.), and ordered Mental Status exam.

content2.Unmatched: be irritating because they are jealous

td.content: Do not IV Fluid and Support
